title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: The JAR packager fails to create the JAR when there are unsaved editors open. Instead, it displays an error message.
EB: I expected to be able to create a JAR even with unsaved editors. If there are unsaved editors, there should be a dialog prompting to save before creating the JAR.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Edit a file without saving.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project.
3. Enter all the required fields such as path, destination, name of JAR packager, description, etc.
4. Press the finish button to create the JAR.
